custom_css: .feeturesHero {width: 100vw; height: unset; aspect-ratio: 2.1; left: calc(50% - 50vw); margin-bottom: -75px;}

settings.header: We create socks designed to enhance the action of life

settings.title: Invisible
settings.body: Rests low on the ankle to stay hidden in casual shoes.

settings.title: No Show Tab
settings.body: Our most popular silhouette. Designed with a tab for comfort and blister protection from friction caused at the back of the shoe.

settings.title: Quarter
settings.body: 2” cuff that hits right above the ball of the ankle for more coverage.

settings.title: Mini Crew
settings.body: A 5” cuff that is perfect for keeping debris out of your socks and showing off your sock-style.

settings.title: Crew
settings.body: 1” Cuff that rests just below mid-calf, perfect for casual or dress attire.

settings.title: Knee
settings.body: Sits just below the knee for snug, smooth compression all the way up the calf muscle.

custom_css: section {width: 100vw; height: auto; position: relative; left: calc(50% - 50vw);}

settings.ultralight_text: Takes up minimal space in the shoe, with more more breathability to keep your feet dry in various conditions.
settings.light_text: High density cushioning provides cushioned comfort and impact protection without the bulk.
settings.max_text: Maximum cushioning that protects the foot, with added impact protection and comfort.

settings.body:
Designed to fit your foot perfectly, every time.

Every sock features:
Eliminates the irritating toe seam, for a smooth and seamless fit.
Our patented compressed arch and heel support allows for more comfort and less irritation.

Fabric made for comfort.

Our 3 Core Fabrics:
Wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry, while providing superior durability.
Built to withstand long wear no matter the conditions.
Sewn with fabrics so comfortable you won’t ever have to think about them.

We take pride in products that are built to last, which is why we are happy to provide a Lifetime Guarantee on all our socks.

We’ve designed our Lifetime Guarantee process to be as easy as possible so that you can receive the socks that meet your needs and get back to doing the activities that keep you moving. Learn more here.

settings.title: Elite
settings.headline: Enhanced fit and feel. If you're looking for the best performance sock on the planet, our elite Socks have it all.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Targeted Compression
Zone-specific compression where you need it most for superior comfort and support.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Anatomical Design
Conforms to left and right structure of the foot providing enhanced fit and reduced risk of blisters.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Anyone who moves their feet, from runners and athletes to medical workers and dog walkers.

settings.title: High Performance
settings.headline: The sock that changed everything. This is the sock that made Feetures famous.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Arch Band
Power bands of Lycra hug your entire foot for maximum support. This snug, supportive fit eliminates movement to prevent blisters.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Breathable Mesh
Mesh construction on top of the sock provides ventilation for added breathability.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Anyone who wants a less compressive comfortable and durable sock, without the left/right fit.

settings.title: Merino 10
settings.headline: Game changing Merino. You’ve never felt a merino sock like this before: comfier, stretchier, drier, and more durable than ever.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Merino Wool & TENCEL Blend
Designed with a distinct blend of Merino wool and Tencel Fibers, which insulates when wet—keeping your feet comfortable and dry, in warm or cold weather.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Reinforced heel and toe.
Redesigned with a reinforced heel and toe and reduced spandex for increased comfort.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Being active in wet or cold conditions, hiking, and anyone who loves wool socks.

settings.title: Trail
settings.headline: Conquer your next hike or trail run and take on a rougher terrain in a sock engineered for durability and comfort.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Targeted Compression
Zone-specific compression where you need it most for superior comfort and support.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Reinforced Zones
Nylon reinforcement featured in high wear areas for added and improved durability.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Hiking and trail running on uneven surfaces.

settings.title: Golf
settings.headline: A runner’s secret weapon, now on the golf course: a sock that stays cool, dry and supportive every step of the way.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Targeted Compression
Zone-specific compression where you need it most for superior comfort and support.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Anatomical Design
Conforms to left and right structure of the foot providing enhanced fit and reduced risk of blisters.

settings.title: Everyday
settings.headline: High-quality performance shouldn’t just be for workouts. That’s why we brought our performance technology into everyday style.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
iWick Fabric
Wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry, while providing superior durability.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Anatomical Design
Conforms to left and right structure of the foot providing enhanced fit and reduced risk of blisters.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Casual and dress wear, with all the benefits of our Elite socks.

settings.title: Plantar Fasciitis Relief
settings.headline: Get quick, convenient relief: these socks stabilize the plantar fascia and support the Achilles tendon, easing your pain.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Extra Targeted Compression
Targeted Compression lifts, stretches and stabilizes the plantar fascia and supports the Achilles tendon.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Eases Heel and Arch Pain
Firm and targeted compression lifts, stretches and stabilizes plantar fascia and supports Achilles tendon.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Extra support for anyone with arch and heel pain, during exercise and everyday activities.

settings.title: Therapeutic
settings.headline: For active diabetics and people with special foot care needs, these socks are APMA-approved.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Non-Binding Top
Approved by the APMA, these socks have a reduced spandex in the cuff helping to reduce possible blood flow constriction.
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Active diabetics and anyone with special foot care needs.

settings.title: Graduated Compression
settings.headline: These socks provide increased blood flow for enhanced performance and faster recovery.
settings.key_feature_one_body:
Graduated Compression
15-20 mmHg of compression begins at the ankle and gradually lessens towards the top of the sock, for improved circulation to reduce muscle fatigue when active and provide faster recovery.
settings.key_feature_two_body:
Anatomical Design
Conforms to left and right structure of the foot providing enhanced fit and reduced risk of blisters
settings.best_for_body: Best for: Improving blood flow in the legs, including for athletic recovery, diabetics, and travel.
